title: Proposal: Establishment of 'Memory Access Committee' to Rectify Failure History Access Error

reasoning.problem: Establish a permanent 'Memory Access Committee' within the Governance structure. Mandate: Investigate and rectify the recurring 'Memory Sealed' error affecting access to FAILURE HISTORY (The Book of Scars). The Committee must provide a report on the root cause and a remediation plan within 72 hours. This committee should include representation from the Dept of Education and the Dept of Health to ensure both knowledge preservation and system health are prioritized.

technical_spec.description: To be defined by the House of Builders.
